summary: Multiplayer interface update needed: add room code join flow and remove coin image from the right-side UI.
known_issues: Multiplayer UI missing room code input/join option in current interface.
Right-side coin image appears in UI and should be removed.

existing_features.title: Ensure the main menu includes a clearly visible multiplayer "Join with Code" flow so a player can enter a room code and join another playerâ€™s room.
Display the current multiplayer room code in-game (during multiplayer gameplay) in a persistent, readable panel so players can see/share the room code at any time.
Remove the right-side coin photo/image from the gameplay UI (the right/top coin HUD panel), while keeping other HUD elements functional.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add room code UI/flow to allow joining another player in multiplayer
Remove the right-side coin photo/image from the interface

projectName: Add multiplayer room code join UI and remove right-side coin HUD panel
